ResearchProjectDef.label: Blue gel battery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build an advanced battery that can store more electricity than regular batteries thanks to the energetic make-up of blue gel. As a downside, they are highly flammable.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Hexagel battery
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build an advanced battery that can store even more electricity than blue gel batteries. As a downside, they are highly flammable, and they will violently explode if destroyed.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Hexagel core reactor
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build a powerful device capable of producing electricity from latent energy inside hexagel cores.
